extendedInfo.description: For clinicians authorized to use Dragon Medical 360 | Mobile Recorder with Nuance Healthcare's background speech solutions. Dragon Medical 360 | Mobile Recorder turns clinicians' Android devices into effective and convenient mobile dictation devices for Dragon Medical 360 | eScription, Dictaphone Enterprise Speech System, and iChart. Clinicians can use Dragon Medical 360 | Mobile Recorder to dictate into their Android devices anytime and anywhere they have an opportunity. Once your clinicians complete their dictations, they can upload them via cellular (3G/4G) or wireless connections to your Nuance background speech platform. Dragon Medical 360 | Mobile Recorder frees your clinicians from docking stations, wireless networks, and carrying an extra digital device for dictation.Dragon Medical 360 | Mobile Recorder leverages the Androidâs design to provide easy to use touch screen controls to search for patients, select work types, record, and upload dictations with a touch of a finger. The high quality voice recordings created by Dragon Medical 360 | Mobile Recorder are optimized for speech processing, which helps produce the best drafts possible for Medical Transcriptionists to edit. With more than 72% of clinicians using smart phones and growing, Dragon Medical 360 | Mobile Recorder provides an exciting new dictation option for your healthcare enterprise.Dragon Medical 360 | Mobile Recorder is compatible with Android devices running Android 2.3.
